1574929776_144CwRj8eynTUC9DtGHaNHR3wm9P2.body: Mormon is how I grew up and the vocabulary I use to express my spiritual place in the cosmos. I have a Quran, a Bible, The Book of Mormon, the Apocrypha, and other spiritual texts to support my continued research into matters of the soul. I hope my dog doesn't mind that I believe in God when we both feel neglected from time to time.
We are all commoners and I enjoy books from every era. Thank you.

1576643812_1G79HnSxfCixN2HD2jP1Zabs1B8xz.body: Cryptocurrency economy needs a non-fiat pinned stablecoin and a crowd-funding platform.

Also, all decentralized software requires centralized hardware which leaves the cryptocurrency economy dependent on corporations and foreign nations.

We need an open-source hardware manufacturer, like Risc-V or PPC, and corresponding wallets programmed for those architectures.

1578781307_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body:
> [re4tsf9e](#comment_108_17SvvdtU1CMTXxiX6zNNsfmcreKmDvzswq): Smaller city states - that's the way to go.

When you say that I hear "a confederacy is better than a union."

Small townships working together, communicating needs, unregulated by any central authority, represented by common courts which share the same laws via the Internet or post. That's what I'd like to see.

A UBI from a centralized federation will create a nation of dependents awaiting a grand collapse.
